## Checklist
- [ ] I have read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] My changes follow the existing file structure and naming conventions
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation (README, INDEX, etc.)
- [ ] I have added examples where helpful
- [ ] I have tested any scripts/tools
- [ ] I have updated VERSION.yaml (if adding features)
- [ ] I have added an entry to CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] My contribution is based on real project experience (not theory)
